page.title: 08Communications around Kilby
page.content: Since the area is mainly Rural with a very small population the methods of communication are also very limited.There are only two Post Boxes in the grid,one in Kilby itself and another outside the grounds of Wistow Hall.Kilby also has a Sub-Post Office and a Public Telephone.The rest of the grid contains so little Urban or dwelling areas that there are no other means of communication than the private telephone system.Although trains pass through the grid none stop so all mail is brought in from Leicester.Since the area is so close to the Urban areas of Wigston and Leicester oll means of communication are within easy reach.
